description: Security pack: detect overly permissive CORS configuration (wildcard origin)

files.content:
server:
  cors:
    access_control_allow_origin: *
    allow_methods: GET, POST

explanation_trace.why_triggered: Content matches the permissive CORS regex: access-control-allow-origin followed by : and wildcard '*'
explanation_trace.edge_case_notes: Uses YAML config format with : separator which matches the regex. The regex accepts both hyphens and underscores as separators.
